name: Captain Han Solo
Lore: 'Smuggler and scoundrel. His piloting abilities have become legend in the Rebellion. Intends to leave the Alliance to pay off Jabba the Hutt.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Falcon, Hoth or Cloud City. Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Falcon, adds one battle destiny and 2 to maneuver. Once during each battle, may use 2 Force to cancel one opponent''s destiny just drawn and cause a re-draw.',
